name: Sheriff Hattery
description:
(Note for anyone, especially game jam judges. Sorry, I am unable to provide a web version of my game since my licence of GMS2 doesn't allow me to export to HTML5 or the like.

If possible, and within the rules, can you please download the .ZIP file, unzip as a new folder and use that? 

Also, any workarounds for this problem for the future would be nice if known, since my licence isn't being upgraded any time soon.

Thanks in advance,

Lewisbacon5)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Sheriff Hattery is on a quest to get past the seemingly endless hordes of evil tumbleweeds, and old, frail men with no arms, who have a dynamite problem.

Submission for the Lost Game Cartridge Jam 2021

credits:

All music was gotten off of 'OpenGameArt' due to time constraints

         Menu: Yubatake, 'MenuLoops'

         Level: Spring Spring, 'Spaghetti Western'

         Ending: tcarisland, 'Barley Rag'

Everything else was made solely by me, using GameMakerStudio2 and BFXR.
